game.name: Intelligence: Cats
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with cats) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images. The essence of the game as in the old game "Fifteen" (15).
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with cats) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images. The essence of the game as in the old game "Fifteen" (15).

reviewHighlights.text: 총 12레벨의 고양이 사진 슬라이드 퍼즐. 1레벨부터 빡치고 있었는데... 메인화면에서 A를 누르면 도과 올클;; BGM이 별론데 끌 수가 없네요. 할인이나 번들로 사세요. [code] 스팀 큐레이터 : [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/...
